import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import './data.css' import AOS from 'aos' import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; AOS.init(); function Vdata() { const [user, setUser] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("https://crud-server-7mzw.vercel.app/api") .then(response => {setUser(response.data);}) .catch(err =>console.log(err))}, []) return (

{user && user.map((user) => { return ( ); })}

)}; export default Vdata
